message: Hi. Welcome to SofaNest, my name is Chris. How can I help you?
This is unacceptable! My sofa was delivered today, but the cushions and one of the legs are missing. Where is the cushions and the leg? I paid good money for this!

I’m really sorry to hear about the missing items, and I completely understand how frustrating this must be. Let me take ownership of this issue and resolve it for you right away. To get started, let’s run through security. Could you please confirm your reference number?
It’s 12345-6789. I’m just so disappointed. This is not what I expected.
Thank you for sharing that. Could you also confirm your email address and name so I can locate your order?
My email is john.doe@example.com, and my name is John Doe.
Thank you, John. That’s all correct. Let me recap: your reference number is 12345-6789, your email is john.doe@example.com, and your name is John Doe. Is that correct?
Yes, that’s correct. But I shouldn’t even have to be doing this. It’s so frustrating.
I completely understand your frustration, John, and I’m truly sorry for the inconvenience caused. Let me look into this and fix it for you. Can you give me a moment to check your order details?
Thank you for waiting. I’ve reviewed your order, and I see that the cushions and the replacement leg were missed during packaging. Have there been any updates from the delivery team regarding this?
No, no updates at all! That’s what’s so frustrating. It feels like no one cares!

I’m so sorry you feel that way, John. I care, and I’m here to make this right. I’ve contacted our logistics team, and I can confirm that the missing items are in stock. Can you give me your availability for a redelivery this week?
Thank you, John. I’ve scheduled the redelivery for Friday afternoon, and you’ll receive a confirmation email shortly. What would you consider a satisfactory resolution for this situation?
Honestly, just getting the items I paid for would be enough at this point.
I completely understand, and I truly appreciate your patience. I’ll personally follow up to ensure the delivery is completed as scheduled. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s all. Thank you for your help.
You’re very welcome, John. I’m sorry again for the inconvenience, but I’m confident we’ve got this sorted. Have a great day, and thank you for choosing SofaNest!
